usage.cn: 理想就像内裤，虽然你有，但是你不能逢人就证明你有。
usage.eng: Dream is like underwear.Although you have it,you can not show it to everyone you meet.

usage.cn: 我知道这世上有人在等我，但我不知道我在等谁，为了这个，我每天都非常快乐。
usage.eng: I know someone in the world is waiting for me, although I've no idea of who he is. But I feel happy every day for this.
